title: Kevin De Bruyne brilliantly sums up every football fan's thoughts on the international break alongside Romelu Lukaku
text:

Every so often a two-week period will appear taking away everything you love and instead substituting it with something that makes you go, "meh". 
Don't you just love the international break? 
It's not like we don't get it, because, you know, major football tournaments in the summer are the best. But to remove the Premier League for TWO WHOLE WEEKS when it's as good as it is right now is hard to take. 
And it appears our thoughts are shared by Manchester City star Kevin De Bruyne. Lukaku tries to raise De Bruyne's spirits (Photo: Instagram/rlukaku9) 
Romelu Lukaku captured his Belgium teammate while on international duty this week - as seen above. The pair appear to be chilling out in a hotel room during some down time. 
The Everton striker tries to motivate De Bruyne by shouting, "yeah baby we live" - but it doesn't work. De Bruyne looks so bored (Photo: Instagram/rlukaku9) 
The midfield maestro manages to say, "Chilling in the national team" before muttering something completely incoherent. 
He looks bored, disinterested and like he doesn't care one bit. This of course sends Lukaku into hysterics. 
We hear you, Kevin. Are you bored of this international break? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
